welcome.title: BIENVENUE CHEZ FAUBOURG BOIS-FRANC!
welcome.message: Located on the corner of Brunswick Boulevard and St. Jean Boulevard in a busy retail node, this highly visible retail property is easily accessible and convenient. The retail mix offer strong destination retailers and popular restaurants.

market_summary.title: Market Summary
market_summary.content: Located in the south-east end of Waterloo, Westside Marketplace offers a wide range of services, food, and fashion.
